students to take online courses from NPTEL/ SWAYAM
portals. For final year students there is a provision for entire
semester Internship and during that period all the courses are done
through online platforms. Research scholars also take online courses
through NPTEL/ SWAYAM portal relevant to their research area.
University is also planning for transfer of Academic Credits through
standard online platforms.
